emailTransform.messyEmail: hey just circling back about the docs thing. we should prob update the timeline but not sure. thoughts?
emailTransform.cleanEmail:
Hi Jamie,

Thanks for your note. I reviewed the documents and updated the transaction timeline. Here is the latest status and next step:
• Appraisal scheduled for Thursday
• Disclosures delivered and acknowledged

I will follow up Friday with a confirmation.

Best,
Alex

impressum.title: Imprint (Impressum)
impressum.description: Legal information and company details for RealtyClose
impressum.responsibilityText: The contents of our pages have been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the contents' accuracy, completeness or topicality. According to statutory provisions, we are furthermore responsible for our own content on these web pages.
impressum.disclaimerText: Our offer contains links to external third party websites. We have no influence on the contents of those websites, therefore we cannot guarantee for those contents. Providers or administrators of linked websites are always responsible for the contents of the linked websites.

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: At RealtyClose, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our Gmail-first AI assistant for real estate communication.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect the following types of information:
dataCollection.item1: Account information: Email address, name, and authentication data when you sign up
dataCollection.item2: Usage data: How you interact with our service, including email drafts and templates used
dataCollection.item3: Technical data: Browser type, device information, and IP address for security and analytics
dataCollection.item4: Email content: Only processed in real-time for AI assistance and immediately discarded

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUse.item1: Provide AI-powered email assistance and drafting services
dataUse.item2: Improve our service quality and develop new features
dataUse.item3: Ensure security and prevent unauthorized access
dataUse.item4: Send important service updates and support communications

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share data only when required by law or to protect our rights and the safety of our users.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption, secure data transmission, and regular security audits. Your email content is processed in real-time and not stored on our servers.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.item1: Access and review your personal information
userRights.item3: Request deletion of your account and associated data
userRights.item4: Withdraw consent and stop using our service at any time

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using RealtyClose, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by these terms, please do not use this service.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.description: RealtyClose is a Gmail-first AI assistant designed to help real estate professionals draft professional emails, manage communications, and maintain compliance. The service operates as a Chrome extension integrated with Gmail.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: As a user, you agree to:
userResponsibilities.item1: Provide accurate and current information when creating your account
userResponsibilities.item2: Use the service only for lawful real estate business purposes
userResponsibilities.item3: Maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials
userResponsibilities.item4: Comply with all applicable real estate regulations and laws

subscription.title: Subscription and Payment
subscription.description: RealtyClose offers various subscription plans. Payments are processed securely through third-party payment processors. You may cancel your subscription at any time, and access will continue until the end of your billing period.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: RealtyClose provides AI assistance for email drafting. Users are responsible for reviewing all AI-generated content before sending. We are not liable for any consequences resulting from the use of AI-generated content.

termination.title: Termination
termination.description: Either party may terminate this agreement at any time. Upon termination, your access to the service will cease, and any outstanding fees will be charged according to our billing terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes, and continued use of the service constitutes acceptance of modified terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at

overview.title: What Are Cookies
overview.description: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site usage, and provide personalized content.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly:
essential.item1: Authentication cookies to keep you logged in
essential.item2: Security cookies to protect against fraud
essential.item3: Preference cookies to remember your settings

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: We use analytics cookies to understand how visitors interact with our website:
analytics.item1: Google Analytics to track page visits and user behavior
analytics.item2: Performance metrics to identify areas for improvement
analytics.item3: Usage statistics to enhance our service offerings

preferences.title: Managing Your Preferences
preferences.description: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality and your user experience.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: Some cookies are set by third-party services we use:

control.title: Cookie Control
control.description: You can control and delete cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to refuse cookies or alert you when cookies are being sent.

contact.title: Questions
contact.description: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at

faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about RealtyClose

founder.question: Who is behind RealtyClose? What are the founder's credentials?
founder.answer:
RealtyClose is founded and led by Dr. Greg Blackburn, a product-focused technologist who has shipped customer-facing software and data workflows in highly regulated environments. Greg's experience spans CRM, workflow automation, and AI-assisted authoring tools used by professional teams.

Education:
• PhD
• MBA
• BIS (Hons)

What this means for you:
• Practical, operations-first design — the product is built around how real agents, TCs, and brokers actually work
• Compliance and trust — workflows are designed to be auditable and policy-friendly from day one
• Shipping discipline — we ship small, verifiable improvements frequently and document what's next

Selected credentials & proof points:
• Track record building and scaling B2B software used by professionals
• Led cross-functional teams across product, engineering, and go-to-market
• Experience integrating with Google Workspace (Gmail/Calendar) and modern APIs
• Strong focus on privacy, least-privilege permissions, and transparent roadmaps

Verification & profiles:
• LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/drgregblackburn
• Google Scholar: https://tinyurl.com/55kxxhas
• Contact: hello@zazatechnologies.com

whatIsRealtyClose.question: What is RealtyClose?
whatIsRealtyClose.answer: RealtyClose is a Gmail-first AI assistant designed specifically for real estate professionals. It helps you draft professional emails in seconds, track deals, and stay compliant - all without leaving Gmail.

howDoesItWork.question: How does RealtyClose work?
howDoesItWork.answer: RealtyClose integrates directly into your Gmail interface as a Chrome extension. When you're composing an email, our AI analyzes the context and suggests professional, compliance-ready responses. You can customize tone, add deal-specific details, and send polished emails in seconds.

whoIsItFor.question: Who is RealtyClose for?
whoIsItFor.answer: RealtyClose is built for all real estate professionals: solo agents, team leads, transaction coordinators, and brokerages. Whether you handle 2 deals a year or 200, our tools scale to help you communicate more efficiently.

pricingPlans.question: What are your pricing plans?
pricingPlans.answer: We offer three main plans: Free (5 drafts/month), Professional ($29/user/month), and Team ($49/user/month). Enterprise plans are available for brokerages with 50+ agents. All paid plans include a 7-day free trial.

freeTrialDetails.question: What's included in the free trial?
freeTrialDetails.answer: The 7-day free trial gives you full access to Professional features: unlimited AI drafts, smart templates, follow-up reminders, and compliance checking. No credit card required to start.

cancelAnytime.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancelAnytime.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access continues until the end of your billing period, and you can always downgrade to our free plan.

dataPrivacy.question: How do you handle my data?
dataPrivacy.answer: We take privacy seriously. RealtyClose operates within Gmail's security framework and follows bank-level encryption standards. We don't store your email content - our AI processes requests in real-time and discards them immediately.

compliance.question: Is RealtyClose compliant with real estate regulations?
compliance.answer: Yes, RealtyClose is designed with compliance in mind. Our templates include required disclosures, our audit logs track all communications, and broker oversight features ensure team compliance. However, you're always responsible for following your local regulations.

gmailSecurity.question: Is my Gmail data secure?
gmailSecurity.answer: Absolutely. RealtyClose uses OAuth 2.0 for secure Gmail access, requiring only the minimum permissions needed. We're SOC 2 compliant and your email data never leaves Google's servers except for real-time AI processing.

installation.question: How do I install RealtyClose?
installation.answer: Simply visit the Chrome Web Store, search for 'RealtyClose', and click 'Add to Chrome'. After installation, open Gmail and you'll see the RealtyClose panel in your sidebar. Sign in with your Google account and you're ready to go.

browserSupport.question: Which browsers are supported?
browserSupport.answer: Currently, RealtyClose is available as a Chrome extension. We're working on support for Edge and Firefox. For the best experience, we recommend using the latest version of Chrome.

mobileSupport.question: Does RealtyClose work on mobile?
mobileSupport.answer: Not yet, but mobile support is coming soon. Currently, RealtyClose works best on desktop/laptop computers using Chrome browser with Gmail.

crmIntegration.question: Does RealtyClose integrate with my CRM?
crmIntegration.answer: RealtyClose works alongside your existing CRM by operating within Gmail. We don't replace your CRM - we enhance your email communication. Direct CRM integrations are planned for future releases.

outlookSupport.question: Do you support Outlook?
outlookSupport.answer: Not currently. RealtyClose is built specifically for Gmail to provide the best possible integration. We may consider Outlook support in the future based on user demand.

teamManagement.question: How does team management work?
teamManagement.answer: Team plans include shared template libraries, role-based permissions, and centralized oversight. Team leads can approve templates, monitor usage, and ensure brand consistency across all team communications.

aiAccuracy.question: How accurate is the AI?
aiAccuracy.answer: Our AI is specifically trained on real estate communication patterns and achieves high accuracy for industry-specific content. However, you should always review and customize AI-generated content before sending.

customTemplates.question: Can I create custom templates?
customTemplates.answer: Yes! Professional and Team plans include custom template creation. You can build templates for common scenarios like listing updates, closing timelines, and client check-ins.

supportOptions.question: What support options are available?
supportOptions.answer: Free users get community support, Professional users get email support, and Team/Enterprise users get priority phone support. We also have extensive documentation and video tutorials.

contact.cantFind: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.
